summary: A teenage girl learns some valuable lessons about love and self-acceptance in this coming-of-age drama from filmmaker Kirsi Liimatainen. Sonja (Sabrina Kruschwitz) has just turned sixteen, ... See full synopsis »
cast: Sabrina Kruschwitz|Julia Kaufmann|Nadja Engel|Christian Kirste|Joachim Lätsch|Gundula Köster|Arthur Prost|Jakob Kraze|Muric Eldin|Norbert Hülm|Mitja Karbautzki
director: Director: Kirsi Liimatainen (as Kirsi Marie Liimatainen)
title: Sonja
